import React from 'react'; import { Col, Container,Image, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Button, Card} from '@mui/material'; const ProductsPage = () => { const product = {id:"1", name:"Longines Master Collection", price:90.00, img:"https://luks33.ru/image/cache/catalog/mens/0/timenn-ru-image-cache-data-Longines-rovno-longines-20master-20goldentimenn-ru-3-990x990-900x900.jpg", quantity:10, categoryType:{id:"2", name:"Quartz Watches", description:"Built with quartz battery at the very core, quartz watch movements are one of the most reliable forms of timekeeping"}} return (

{product.name}

{product.categoryType.name}
Available for order: {product.quantity}
{product.price}$

{product.categoryType.description}

 ); }; export default ProductsPage;
